analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol:
	Contract TerraformReserve has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#165-167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TokenVesting._releaseTo (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#362-370):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount() (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#364-366)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#367-369)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#379-389):
	External calls:
	- _releaseTo(beneficiary) (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#382-386)
	- token.safeTransfer(owner,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#387-388)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#388-389)

TerraformReserve.setTargetContract (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#149-160) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-manaToken.approve(landClaim,totalLocked) (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#155-160)

TokenVesting.releaseForeignToken (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#420-424) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#423-424)

Reentrancy in TerraformReserve.lockMana (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#127-137):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(manaToken.transferFrom(_from,this,mana)) (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#131-135)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockedBalance (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#135)
	- totalLocked (/unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol#136-137)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xe93b1e712db327d8ce1ef6fdf9719312b8b5dc00.sol:
